<title>Custom Eye-Tracking Solution for Neurological Research— ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="ITRex helped a university-based research team develop a custom eye-tracking technology solution featuring custom hardware, embedded software, and a desktop app for camera and sensor data processing. Discover how we navigated this challenge." />
